description:
Nice 16km trail (one way) through the old 
 forests of the Eastern Townships. This is a two 
car hike. Hike is part of Les Sentier de l?Estrie, a 
 $5 fee per individual is required for access. 
Trails are well marked. Beautiful scenery throughout the hike. Moose, bears and deer are 
 seen in the area. Two rustic campgrounds are located at kms 4,5 and 14,6 from the Western 
 parking area. Very nice for snowshoes
